stab.name: Stab
stab.brief: This is an elaborate attack that involves putting your sword in your target's body.

shield.name: Shield
shield.desc: Blocks ${block} of each incoming damage for your target
shield.brief: Hate dying? Just Say No with this shield! Regardless, this won't work against piercing damage.

zap.name: Zap
zap.desc: Deals ${damage} damage and applies 2 Stun effects to your target
zap.brief: One of the most basic spells. If you can't even do this, you should go back to spell school or something.

absorb.name: Absorb
absorb.brief: Somehow this turns damage into healing. No one knows how it works, but does that really matter?

explode.name: Explode
explode.desc: Deals ${damage} damage to your target and ${self_damage} damage to yourself

heal.name: Heal
heal.brief: There's no hospitals here. This is the closest you'll get to a health plan.

sacrifice.name: Sacrifice
sacrifice.desc: Deals ${damage} damage to your target and yourself. Also applies 4 Curse effects to your target
sacrifice.cdesc: Applies 2 additional Curse effects to your target
sacrifice.brief: This curse sacrifices a bit of your vitality for some damage. Be careful not to kill yourself, though. That would be *so* embarrassing (and deadly).

flashy fireworks.name: Flashy Fireworks
flashy fireworks.desc: Deals ${damage} x5 damage to your target, applying 1 Burn effect for each hit
flashy fireworks.brief: Give your target a taste of the New Year experience with these AdventureWorks:tm:!

multi punches.name: Multi Punches
multi punches.desc: Deals ${damage} x3 damage to your target.
multi punches.brief: Some insanely smart martial artist went, "What if you punched *more than once?*" And thus this move was born.

punch.name: Punch
punch.desc: Deals ${damage} damage to your target. Doesn't use any stamina.

strike.name: Strike
strike.brief: A swift strike that looks a lot like a Pokemon move.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.desc: Deal ${damage} damage and applies 2 Burn effects to your target
fireball.brief: This ball of fire also works great at BBQs.

aid.name: Aid
aid.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health along with 4 recover effects.
aid.cdesc: Heal doubles, and apply 2 additional recover effects.
aid.brief: The long-awaited sequel to the heal spell. After 9 years in development, hopefully it will have been worth the wait.

lightning bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
lightning bolt.desc: Deals ${damage} damage to your target and applies 3 Stun effects.
lightning bolt.brief: This spell actually takes a lot more work than stock zap. You have to summon clouds, get all the particles line up and whatnot...

cocktail.name: Cocktail
cocktail.desc: Deals ${eff_app_target_burn_damage} damage to your target for every Burn effect they have (max 10x).
cocktail.cdesc: Set max Burn effect applicable to 15x.
cocktail.brief: Unleash your inner anarchist with this highly flammable alcohol.

insult.name: Insult
insult.desc: Deals ${damage} damage to your target and applies 2 Curse effects.
insult.cdesc: Double the damage, double the applied Curse effects

aim.name: Aim
aim.desc: Blocks ${block} damage and applies 3 Bullseye effects to your target.
aim.cdesc: Double the block, apply 2 additional Bullseye effects.
aim.brief: A simple deep breath can do wonders.

execration.name: Execration
execration.desc: Deals ${eff_app_target_burn_damage} damage to your target for every Curse effect they have (max x15), but then removes up to 15 Curse effects from your target.
execration.cdesc: Set the max Curse effect applicable to 20x.
execration.brief: One wizard says they saw their enemy literally get dragged into Hell after casting this spell. They're probably lying, but it's a cool thing to imagine.

hellfire.name: Hellfire
hellfire.desc: Deals ${damage} x2 damage to your target, and apply 1 burn and 1 curse to your target for each hit, and this card will stay on your hand after being used
hellfire.brief: Summons blue flames straight from hell that can be used for great s'mores. Surely no one would use this spell for other purposes, right?

revenge.name: Revenge
revenge.desc: Deals ${revenge} * (1 - health / max_health) ^ 2 to your target.
revenge.brief: Call an ambulance, but not for you!

bees swarm.name: Bees Swarm
bees swarm.desc: Deals ${damage} x4 damage to your target, applying 1 poison effect for each hit.

cursed clover.name: Cursed Clover
cursed clover.desc: Deals ${damage} x2 damage, applying a Burn, Curse, Poison, and Stun effect to your target while dealing ${self_damage} damage to yourself for each hit that landed
cursed clover.brief: The two-leaf clover, evil sibling of the four-leaf clover, excels at inflicting physical and psychological damage to everyone. Geez, who hurt it so bad?

confetti cannon.name: Confetti Cannon
confetti cannon.desc: Deals ${damage} damage and spawns 2 temporary **[NA/1] Distraction lv: ${level}** cards into your opponent's cards
confetti cannon.brief: How the hell do you manage to get a cannon out here?

tsunami wave.name: Tsunami Wave
tsunami wave.desc: Deals ${damage} damage, removing all effects from the target player.
tsunami wave.brief: Your clothes getting wet is the last thing you'll be worrying about.

butterflies.name: Butterflies
butterflies.desc: Deals ${damage} damage to your target and randomly spawns 1 temporary **[NA/1] Distraction lv: ${level}** into your opponent's cards. Doesn't use any stamina.
butterflies.brief: What kind of buffoon would get distracted by some stupid butterf-oh look, that one has like a rainbow pattern! It's so cute!

relic.name: Relic
relic.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health and draws 2 more cards. This card will stay on your hand after being used.
relic.brief: I play **RELIC**! It allows me to draw **TWO ADDITIONAL CARDS** from my deck!

fury slashes.name: Fury Slashes
fury slashes.desc: Deals ${damage} x2 damage to your target, applying 1 Berserk effect to yourself per landed hit
fury slashes.brief: An advanced fighting technique that temporarily strengthens your future attacks.

slash.name: Slash
slash.brief: It's in the name. You *slash*. What more is there?

ignite.name: Ignite
ignite.desc: Deals ${damage} damage, applying 1 Burn effect to your target.
ignite.cdesc: Damage doubles, Burn effects applied doubles, priority increases to 2.
ignite.brief: This can be done through magic, but most just settle for throwing a match on their target instead.

sting.name: Sting
sting.desc: Deals ${damage} damage and applies 2 poison effects to your target.
sting.brief: When you're tired of bees screwing it up, just do the darn thing yourself.

snowball.name: Snowball
snowball.desc: Deals ${damage} damage and applies 4 chill effects to your target
snowball.brief: Slushballs are just plain dirty. Doesn't mean you can't use them though.

trample.name: Trample
trample.desc: Decrease your target's defense by ${tramp} and deals ${damage} damage to your target.
trample.brief: Your target will think they're safe behind their shield, but little do they know about this move.

bats swarm.name: Bats Swarm
bats swarm.desc: Deal ${damage} x3 damage to your target and applies 1 recover effect to yourself for each hit.
bats swarm.brief: A group of four devilish little bats.

spikes bomb.name: Spikes Bomb
spikes bomb.desc: Deals ${on_hand_self_damage} damage to yourself for each turn this is in your hand. Deals ${damage} x4 damage to your target when used.
spikes bomb.brief: Literally just a bomb with spikes on it. Who thought this was a good idea?

pandemic.name: Pandemic
pandemic.desc: Deals ${damage} damage and applies 4 poison effects to your target, also spawning 4 temporary **[NA/0] Virus lv: ${level}** into both your target's cards and your cards.

ice spike.name: Ice Spike
ice spike.desc: Deals ${damage} damage and applies 3 chill effects to your target.
ice spike.brief: Just being near this darn thing will give you frostbite: don't even *think* about licking it.

quick shot.name: Quick Shot
quick shot.desc: Deals ${damage} damage and applies 1 bullseye effect to yourself
quick shot.brief: Who needs a bow when you can just throw the arrow yourself?

skeletal slay.name: Skeletal Slay
skeletal slay.desc: Deals ${damage} x3 damage, applying 1 Curse effect per landed hit.
skeletal slay.cdesc: All damage doubles and priority increases to 2.
skeletal slay.brief: This cursed sword made from the bones of the damned can cut through the toughest of enemies. It's also great for chopping fruits and veggies.

meditate.name: Meditate
meditate.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health, and you draw 2 cards when used
meditate.cdesc: Heal doubles, and draw 3 cards instead 2.
meditate.brief: Your enemies can't attack you while your meditating. It's the law.

ice breaker.name: Ice Breaker
ice breaker.desc: Deals ${damage} x4 damage to your target. If your target is frozen, this attack deal 50% more damage.
ice breaker.cdesc: Damage doubles. If your target is frozen, crit increases by 100% instead 30% in addition to 50% more damage.
ice breaker.brief: Whoever invented this spell must really hate popsicles.

reckless assault.name: Reckless Assault
reckless assault.desc: Deals ${damage} damage to yourself and applies 2 burn, 2 curse, 2 poison, 2 bullseye, and 4 berserk effects to yourself
reckless assault.cdesc: Berserk and Bullseye effects applied double.
reckless assault.brief: You'll be just like Leroy Jenkins after using this.

seed.name: Seed
seed.brief: A magical seed, brought from the gardens of the heaven. Who knows what it will become when it sprouts?

sprout.name: Sprout
sprout.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health, and this card becomes a **[L/4] Sapling lv: ${level}**.
sprout.cdesc: Heal doubles, and this card becomes a **[L/6] Holy Tree lv: ${level}**.
sprout.brief: A symbol of hope from the heavens, still capable of growing stronger.

sapling.name: Sapling
sapling.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health, and this card becomes a **[L/6] Holy Tree lv: ${level}**
sapling.cdesc: Use this card as **[L/6] Holy Tree lv: ${level}**.
sapling.brief: A gift of the gods, spreading the auras of the ancient world. However, it has not fully matured.

holy tree.name: Holy Tree
holy tree.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health, and this applies 6 recover effects, removing all negative effects from your target, and goes back to being a **[L/0] Seed lv: ${level}**
holy tree.cdesc: Heal doubles, apply 12 recover effects instead 6.
holy tree.brief: An enchanted tree of healing bearing the symbol of life and prosperity. It drops a single seed upon granting its healing powers to its summoner.

cache.name: Cache
cache.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health, and this applies 9 Restore effects to your target
cache.cdesc: Heal doubles, and apply 11 Restore effects instead 9.
cache.brief: Harness your inner merchant and invest your energy for great returns!

blessed clover.name: Blessed Clover
blessed clover.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health, and this also applies 1 Recover, 2 Bullseye, and 2 Restore effects to said target.
blessed clover.cdesc: Repeat the ability x2 times instead x1.
blessed clover.brief: This clover absolutely loathes its two-leafed cousin. Every time a the Thanksgiving Clover Reunion rolls around they argue over the littlest things.

terminate.name: Terminate
terminate.brief: I need your clothes, your boots, and your motorcycle.

crush.name: Crush
crush.desc: Decrease your target's defense by ${tramp}, and apply 1 Stun effect to your target.
crush.cdesc: Defense decrease and applied effect doubles.
crush.brief: Counter-attack the attack counters with this scuffed move.

beatdown.name: Beatdown
beatdown.desc: Deals ${damage} damage to your target and applies 4 Seriate effects to yourself
beatdown.cdesc: Damage doubles and apply 8 Seriate effects instead 4.
beatdown.brief: A preparation spell to initiate a frenzy killing mode. On use, the user obtains the ability to get stronger for every regular move being used. Can become very deadly.

soul drain.name: Soul Drain
soul drain.desc: You gain ${eff_app_target_curse_heal} health for every Curse effect your target has (max 15), and this also removes up to 15 Curse effects from your target
soul drain.cdesc: Maximum Curse effects applicable increases to 25.
soul drain.brief: A reworked Execration, healing the caster based on their enemy's curses instead of dealing amplified damage.

incapacitate.name: Incapacitate
incapacitate.desc: Deals ${damage} damage and applies 2 Feeble effects to your target
incapacitate.cdesc: Damage doubles, apply 4 Feeble effects instead 2.
incapacitate.brief: A sly attack. Commonly used by thieves, this allows them to steal things easily.

immobilize.name: Immobilize
immobilize.desc: Deals ${damage} damage and applies 3 Feeble effects to your target
immobilize.cdesc: Damage doubles, apply 6 Feeble effects instead 3.
immobilize.brief: An improved version of Incapacitate. Mastered only by truly skilled fighters.

coup de grace.name: Coup De Grace
coup de grace.desc: Deals ${damage} damage and applies 8 Recover effects to your target
coup de grace.brief: A death blow to end the suffering and misery of a poor soul. However, it can heal them if not used carefully.

dragonmaster.name: Dragonmaster
dragonmaster.desc: Deals ${damage} damage and 1000 Burn effects to your target and ${self_damage} damage to yourself
dragonmaster.brief: A card that can only be used by the Dragon boss.

ironfire.name: Ironfire
ironfire.desc: Deals ${damage} damage to your target and ${self_damage} damage to yourself
ironfire.brief: A card that can be only used by the Ironfire boss.

distraction.name: Distraction
distraction.desc: Does absolutely nothing but waste your energy and stamina.
distraction.brief: A temporary card spawned in a player's cards. These cards can usually only be used once.

haunted.name: Haunted
haunted.desc: Deals ${on_hand_damage} damage and applies 1 Curse effect to yourself for every turn where this is in your hand. Does nothing when used.
haunted.brief: A temporary card spawned in a player's cards. Temporary cards can usually only be used once.

virus.name: Virus
virus.desc: Spawns 1 temporary **[NA/0] Virus lv: ${level}** in your target's cards. Doesn't use any stamina.
virus.brief: A temporary card spawned in a player's cards. Temporary cards can usually only be used once.

dark resurrection.name: Dark Resurrection
dark resurrection.desc: Clears all effects from yourself and sets your max health to 75%, but heals you up to your reduced max health.
dark resurrection.brief: A temporary card that spawns in a player's cards. Temporary cards can usually only be used once.

loot.name: Loot
loot.desc: Deals ${damage} to your target and steals some golden coins as well.
loot.brief: A quick attack used by thieves who steal golden coins from traders or adventurers in the blink of an eye.

steal.name: Steal
steal.desc: Deals ${damage} damage to your target and steals an item from their inventory.
steal.brief: A sneak attack that can snatch a possession of the target, but the technique is quite hard to master. The life of a thief isn't easy.

smash.name: Smash
smash.desc: Deals ${damage} damage and applies 2 Stun effects to your target.
smash.brief: A tremendous blow that deals massive damage. Only the strongest warriors have enough strength to use this attack.

battle cry.name: Battle Cry
battle cry.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health and applies 3 Recover and Bullseye effects to said target.
battle cry.brief: Nothing can bring back the spirit of a soldier like a good ol' battle cry.

enrage.name: Enrage
enrage.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health, applies 4 Berserk effects, and spawns a **[M/3] Battle Cry lv: ${level}** into your target's cards.
enrage.brief: Absolute rage, incomprehensible emotion. This display of rage can allow monsters to temporarily surpass their physical limits.

paranoid.name: Paranoid
paranoid.desc: Deals ${damage} damage and applies 3 Chill effects to your target. This also spawns 1 temporary **[NA/1] Haunted lv: ${level}** into your target's cards.
paranoid.brief: People who suffer from paranoia will often hear the steps of the unseen...

demonic ritual.name: Demonic Ritual
demonic ritual.desc: Deals ${damage} damage to both your target and yourself and randomly spawns 1 temporary **[NA/0] Dark Resurrection lv: ${level}** into your card stack.
demonic ritual.brief: One of the most evil and dangerous dark magic spells created in the world. However, because this spell is so old and almost impossible to master, even some of the most renowned adventurers don't know about the existence of this magic.

devour.name: Devour
devour.brief: A miniature blackhole-like magic absorbing all obstacles in its path.

reform.name: Reform
reform.desc: You gain ${heal} health, and your max health is reduced to 50% of what it was previously.
reform.brief: This dark magic can reform even the most severely damaged object into a new one, but of lower quality.

harden scales.name: Harden Scales
harden scales.desc: Blocks ${block} damage and draws 3 cards for your target.
harden scales.brief: A defensive ability which powerful scaled creatures use to defend themselves.

prideful flight.name: Prideful Flight
prideful flight.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health and restores 3 stamina, and apply 10 Restore effects to yourself.
prideful flight.brief: The user takes flight, casting off all ailments.

combust.name: Combust
combust.desc: Deals ${eff_app_target_burn_damage} x7 damage to your target for every Burn effect your target has.
combust.brief: An immensely powerful flame-based attack used only by the Red Wyvern.

rapid burst.name: Rapid Burst
rapid burst.desc: Deals ${damage} x7 damage and apply 1 Burn effect to your target for each hit.
rapid burst.brief: Miniature fireballs rain down from above. Only Red Wyverns and dragons can use effectively.

rejuvenate.name: Rejuvenate
rejuvenate.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health, applies 5 Recover effects to yourself, and clear all negative effects from the target except Poison. This card will stay in your hand when used and costs 3 stamina.
rejuvenate.brief: An immensely powerful healing spell, usable only by incredibly powerful mages.

smite.name: Smite
smite.desc: Deals ${lich_revenge} * ( ( current hp / max hp ) ^ 50 ) damage. This card will stay in your hand when used and costs 3 stamina.
smite.brief: An attack which deals damage by draining power directly from the user's life force.

regenerate.name: Regenerate
regenerate.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health and has all negative effects except Poison removed, and applies 5 Recover effects to yourself. This card costs 2 stamina.
regenerate.brief: A natural ability wielded by liches. It heals them at the cost of draining their energy.
